title: Can I complete the class 11 syllabus in 20 days? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can just for the sake of it! But how much of it can you remember and are your concepts clear or are you done the practicalities of the concepts is the question. In 20 hours you can complete few chapters of few subjects for sure but not the entire syllabus. When you do anything, do it well to do good! That is what matters.
